name: ZK stablecoin
description: A stablecoin that allows you to wrap a stablecoin so it can be privately transferred.

name: Private voting
description: Enable polling or voting off-chain, vote results could be aggregated and submitted on-chain in one transaction

name: EIP-4527 Keycard signer
description: Keycard Shell uses EIP-4527 (IIUC) to be able to communicate TX data and signature via QR codes. Build a mobile app that does just that and uses Keycard via NFC to actually sign.
